citations.narrative:
On the east side outdoor area, in the middle enclosure, one of the posts by an enclosure divider that the dogs can access
has had part of the bottom chewed off. Chewed wood can no longer be cleaned and sanitized effectively and if not
repaired can affect the structure. Ensure this post is repaired and maintain posts in a manner that can be regularly
cleaned and sanitized.
***Correct by 8/27/2024.

The facility is following a written program of veterinary care (PVC) that includes regular scheduled visits, a vaccine
schedule, heartworm and fecal testing, and other required preventive care but the written PVC is not signed by the
attending veterinarian (AV). A signed PVC helps ensure the care schedules in place have been reviewed and approved
by the AV. Ensure that the PVC is reviewed and signed by the AV.
***Correct by 8/27/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
On the east side outdoor area, in the middle enclosure, one of the posts by an enclosure divider that the dogs can access 
has had part of the bottom chewed off. Chewed wood can no longer be cleaned and sanitized effectively and if not 
repaired can affect the structure. Ensure this post is repaired and maintain posts in a manner that can be regularly 
cleaned and sanitized.  
***Correct by 8/27/2024. 
3.13(a) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility is following a written program of veterinary care (PVC) that includes regular scheduled visits, a vaccine 
schedule, heartworm and fecal testing, and other required preventive care but the written PVC is not signed by the 
attending veterinarian (AV). A signed PVC helps ensure the care schedules in place have been reviewed and approved 
by the AV. Ensure that the PVC is reviewed and signed by the AV.  
***Correct by 8/27/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
